src:
謝忻萬聖節深V露半球　扮「胸」狠小丑讓人流鼻血
01 Nov 2019, 03:07 by 朱晉緯
知名藝人謝忻在前陣子和阿翔的不倫戀風波逐漸平息後，也開始復工並活躍於社群媒體。謝忻31日即在臉書粉專中po出萬聖節相關貼文，不僅臉上畫著小丑妝容，還大方露出「半球」，以深V姿態復出。
謝忻在經歷過前陣子與阿翔的風波後，在螢光幕上黯淡了一陣子，但最近於社群媒體依舊活躍，並在臉書上發布「理想中的萬聖節vs.現實中的萬聖節…」，貼出自己2張萬聖節扮裝照，並和小朋友一同扮裝合照。



謝忻在萬聖節大膽貼出自己「胸」狠的深V照，引發討論。（翻攝自謝忻臉書）



謝忻還貼出自己與小朋友的扮裝合照，十分活潑。（翻攝自謝忻臉書）



謝忻與阿翔不倫戀風波逐漸平息後，她也開始復工並活躍於社群媒體。（翻攝自謝忻臉書）


謝忻一張照片貼出自己穿著深V衣，大膽袒露，「半球」都已經出現，臉上也掛著小丑的妝容。許多網友熱烈回覆「這鬼也太胸狠了吧」「這樣犯規」「頭以下比較嚇人」「流鼻血了」，似乎已經恢復許多人氣。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 03:17
text:
Xie Tao's Halloween Deep V Dew Hemisphere, playing "chest", clown, letting nosebleed
01 Nov 2019, 03:07 by Zhu Jinwei
The well-known artist Xie Tao began to return to work and was active in the social media after the unrelenting love affair of Axiang and Axiang gradually subsided. On the 31st, Xie Tao published a Halloween-related post in the face book powder. Not only did the face paint the clown makeup, but also revealed the "hemisphere" and returned in a deep V posture.
Xie Tao has been dimmed on the fluorescent screen for a while after experiencing the storm of Abandon and Axiang, but recently the social media is still active, and published on the Facebook "The ideal Halloween vs. Halloween in reality." ...", post your own 2 Halloween costume photos, and take a photo with the children.



Xie Tao boldly posted a deep V photo of her "chest" on Halloween, sparking discussion. (Reflected from Xie Yan's Facebook)



Xie Tao also posted a photo of herself and her children, very lively. (Reflected from Xie Yan's Facebook)



After Xie Tao and A Xiang's love affair gradually subsided, she also resumed work and was active in the social media. (Reflected from Xie Yan's Facebook)


Xie Tao posted a photo of herself wearing a deep V suit, boldly revealing, "hemisphere" has appeared, and the face of the clown is also hung on his face. Many netizens replied enthusiastically, "This ghost is too chesty." "This foul" "There is a scary head below" and "nostalgia" seems to have recovered many popularity.
Update time|2019.11.01 03:17
